name: Dhos Adventures
description:
Dhos is a funny 2D pixelated platformer.

You play as a happy lemon on his long adventure through many different places. You will encounter various characters, who may help you on your quest as well as enemies who will stand on your way and disturb you in your actions.
During your journey, you will visit 8 chapters, which consist of 3 levels each. Every chapter is different and so provides different challenges and enemies.
Every chapter ends with tough and demanding encounter (where some of them can be passed in a more safer and trickier way).
You can defeat enemies by jumping on them or later deal with them from distance.
You can also use some objects in your environment for your advantage or to reach some areas.

On your journey, you may encounter some riddles which may lead to unaccesible secret areas, additional helpfull items or just cause you trouble if you make a mistake.
Be carefull! The world can be a dangerous place for someone as little as you! There might be many things and obstacles which may cause you a lot of trouble and get you hurt!

Be patient, careful and never loose your spirit! :)
Help Dhos accomplish his quest and also reveal a mystery behind this all!
